text:
@SpeakerPelosi January 31, 2020 – Upon the recommendation of his Coronavirus task force , Trump shuts down flights from China.

February 24, 2020 – Because of her hatred towards Trump Pelosi tells everyone Trump is being a racist and that everyone should visit Chinatown in San Francisco.
